system:
note description: "Objects that represent a tab associated with a notebook item." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2017-03-27 13:31:29 -0700 (Mon, 27 Mar 2017) $" revision: "$Revision: 100058 $"
class ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK_TAB_IMP
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_tab_i.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK_TAB_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xmlEV_TEXTABLE_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xmlEV_PIXMAPABLE_I redefine ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface, ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_remove_pixmapremove_pixmap, ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_set_pixmapset_pixmap, ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_pixmappixmap end
create ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_makemake
feature {NONE} -- Initialization
f_old_make../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_old_makeold_make (an_interface: attached like ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface) -- Create Current with interface an_interface. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_assign_interfaceassign_interface (an_interface) end
f_make../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_makemake -- Initialize Current. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_initializedset_is_initialized (True) end
f_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_pixmappixmap: detachable ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Image displayed on Current or Void if none. do if attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_notebook_impnotebook_imp as l_notebook_imp and then attached ../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_tab_i.xml#f_widgetwidget as l_widget then Result := l_notebook_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_imp.xml#f_item_pixmapitem_pixmap (l_widget) end end
f_text../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_texttext: FalseSTRING_32 -- Text displayed on Current do if attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_notebook_impnotebook_imp as l_notebook_imp and then attached ../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_tab_i.xml#f_widgetwidget as l_widget then Result := l_notebook_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_imp.xml#f_item_textitem_text (l_widget) else create Result.Falsemake (0) end end
feature -- Element change
f_set_text../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_set_textset_text (a_text: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Assign a_text to ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_texttext. do if attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_notebook_impnotebook_imp as l_notebook_imp and then attached ../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_tab_i.xml#f_widgetwidget as l_widget then l_notebook_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_imp.xml#f_set_item_textset_item_text (l_widget, a_text) end end
f_set_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_set_pixmapset_pixmap (a_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP) -- Assign a_pixmap to ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_pixmappixmap. do if attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_notebook_impnotebook_imp as l_notebook_imp and then attached ../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_tab_i.xml#f_widgetwidget as l_widget then l_notebook_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_imp.xml#f_set_item_pixmapset_item_pixmap (l_widget, a_pixmap) end end
f_remove_pixmap../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_remove_pixmapremove_pixmap -- Make ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_pixmappixmap Void. do if attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_notebook_impnotebook_imp as l_notebook_imp and then attached ../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_tab_i.xml#f_widgetwidget as l_widget then l_notebook_imp.../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_imp.xml#f_set_item_pixmapset_item_pixmap (l_widget, Void) end end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_notebook_imp../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_notebook_impnotebook_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_imp.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK_IMP -- Access to implementation of ../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_tab_i.xml#f_notebooknotebook. -- Note that Result may be Void if ../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_tab_i.xml#f_notebooknotebook is. do if attached ../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_tab_i.xml#f_notebooknotebook as l_notebook then Result ?= l_notebook.../interface/ev_notebook.xml#f_implementationimplementation end ensure not_void_if_notebook_not_void: ../implementation_interface/ev_notebook_tab_i.xml#f_notebooknotebook /= Void implies Result /= Void end
f_destroy../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_destroydestroy -- Destroy underlying native toolkit objects. -- Render Current unusable. -- Any feature calls after a call to destroy are -- invalid. do ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_set_is_destroyedset_is_destroyed (True) end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_notebook_tab_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_notebook_tab.xmlEV_NOTEBOOK_TAB note option: stable attribute end
